name: Hypno Op Art Orb Target v1 🎯
description:
[13-03-20]
Collaboration with the guy living upstairs also known as the Dr.Jerkill. As we often did during those days my and my friend Matt would sit in the same room in front of our computers each making our daily projects. He would often make 3D elements for me as I would help me with particle systems and after effect editing. Matt created a C4D version and I created this one in after effects.  


Xponentialdesign After Effects + Trapcode Mir version
